text: Lin or LIN may refer to: * LIN Media, an American television broadcasting group * Linate Airport, Milan, Italy * Lingala language, a Bantu language of central Africa * Liquid nitrogen, nitrogen in a liquid state at an extremely low temperature * Local Interconnect Network, used by vehicle computers * lin., abbreviation for linear == People == *Lin (surname) (normally ), a Chinese surname *Lin-Manuel Miranda (born 1980), American composer *Lin, short for Linda *Lin (The King of Fighters), Chinese assassin character *Lin Chow Bang, character in Fat Pizza == Places == *Lin, Korçë, village in Pogradec District, Albania *Lin, Shkodër, village in Shkodër District, Albania *Lin County, Henan, former name of Linzhou, city in Henan, China *Lin County, Shanxi, in China *Lin, Iran, a village in Mazandaran Province ==See also == * Lian (surname) (Chinese ) * Lyn (disambiguation) * Lynn (given name) Category:Disambiguation pages with given-name-holder lists Category:Chinese given names Category:Burmese names Category:Unisex given names
title: Lin
